description.narrative: To strengthen the management of environmental and social issues associated with the sustainable use of natural resources in Lao PDR.

condition.narrative: Action plans to bring each hydropower facility constructed since 1990 into full compliance are prepared and disclosed by eachowning company
By December 31, 2010, WREA has prepared guidelines for incorporating ECC measures in Concession Agreement for hydropower projectssigned by the Recipient after the enactment of the Environment and Soc
Increase in the % of complaints resolved in Bolikhamxay and Khammouane Provinces. First measurement of this indicator will beconducted by December 2010 to serve as a new baseline. The target is by
Increase in the % of environment compliance certificates (ECCs) issued by WREA that are of adequate quality as judged by a thirdparty annually starting June 2010 as a baseline and agree on the % incr
Institutional Framework for Nam Thuen/Nam Kading Basins
Institutional framework for monitoring the implementation of the National Policy on ES sustainability of the hydropower sector
Provincial Enviornmental Stagegy and Action Plans for three provinces.

title.narrative: 80% of Sub-projects financed by the Additional Grant have been completed satisfactorily by December 31, 2012.

comment.narrative: Of 19 subgrants, 17 or 89.44% closed, two will be completed by the end of June

title.narrative: By December 31, 2012, EPF's annual administrative cost (about 33% of a Sub-grant amount) has been reduced to no more than 15% of anAdditional Grant

comment.narrative: WMU budget is about $0.44 million (14.66%) for $3.0 million total grant.

title.narrative: 80% of Sub-projects financed by the Original Grant have been completed satisfactorily by December 31, 2010.

comment.narrative: Of 154 total subgrants signed under LENs, 152 subgrants (98.7%) were completed.

title.narrative: By December 31, 2012, at least 10 conservation communities are established in NT-NKD

comment.narrative: Community Conservation Network was established in 12 communities.

title.narrative: WREA has prepared guidelines for incorporating ECC measures in Concession Agreement for hydropower projects signed by Recipient after enactment of the Environment and Social Impact Assessment decree

comment.narrative: Four of five CAs signed since 2010 for ongoing hydropowere project has incorporated SESO. One is in progress.

title.narrative: By December 31, 2012 national guideline for Ethnic Groups' consultation has been completed and the relevant agencies' staff have been trained on how to conduct such consultation.

comment.narrative: The guideline is approved and and consultation is completed. Additional training will be provided to southern provinces.

title.narrative: Areas brought under enhanced biodiversity protection (ha)

comment.narrative: Management plans have been developed for six provincial protected areas in three project target provinces. The value in ha is168,993Ha.

title.narrative: By December 31, 2012, an implementation model for a river basin organization in Lao PDR is developed.

comment.narrative: A model was established. It was indicated in the project completion report.

title.narrative: By December 31, 2010, site plans for 6 protected areas are available and the site plans have identified priority actions.
By December 31, 2012, at least 60% of the priority activities identified are being implemented in the 6 protected areas.

comment.narrative: The implementation of is planned under the new LEnS II project.

title.narrative: Sub-projects with post-project community engagement or O&M arrangements (%)

comment.narrative: 173 sub-projects signed, 171 completed, two will be completed by June 30.

title.narrative: EPF and WREA have received part of the NT2 revenue for financing their respective priority development projects by December 31, 2010.

comment.narrative: The discussion is ongoing, but it could be only partially met by the end of the project. 3% (3billion LAK) of received forenvironment sector, which is 50% (1.5billion LAK) goes to MoNRE, but not received by EPF.

title.narrative: By December 31, 2010, database for tracking type and number of development projects in the Selected Provinces is established.
Social safeguard training program is developed for agencies and provinces participating in the Project and at least 60 trainees aretrained

comment.narrative: Training completed. More than 150 trainees were trained.

title.narrative: Increase in the % of complaints resolved in Bolikhamxay and Khammouane Provinces.

comment.narrative: Data suggested that 96% (229 of 238) in BLKX and 100% (280) in Khammouane complaints have been resolved through this mechanism

title.narrative: Sub-projects that are expected to have a mechanism for post-completion operation
Grievances related to delivery of project benefits that are addressed-(number)
Grievances registered related to delivery of project benefits addressed (%)

comment.narrative: Increase in the % of complaints resolved in Bolikhamxay (96%) and Khammouane (100%) Provinces

title.narrative: By December 31, 2012, a unit responsible for monitoring social impacts and a functional complaint handling mechanism are established in Bolikhamxay and Khammouane Provinces.

comment.narrative: SIMUs were established in BLKX and KM provinces. The provincial governor has issued legal letter to map SIMU under PoNRE.

title.narrative: Increase in the % of environment compliance certificates (ECCs) issued by WREA that are of adequate quality as judged by a third party annually starting June 2010

comment.narrative: One CA singed in 2012 has included SESO, discussion going on. To date, means of five CAs signed since 2010, four or 80% hydropowerprojects have included SESO.

title.narrative: By June 30, 2010, the River Basin Committee for NT-NKD is established.

comment.narrative: Met. One RBC was established. Further capacity building is needed.
